sentences.en: “There was good reason to keep relations with Washington on an even keel”(&b{Helen Kitchen})
sentences.cn: “与华盛顿保持平稳关系是很理智的”(&b{海伦·基钦})

sentences.en: always try everything even if it turns out to be a dud.
sentences.cn: 任何东西都试一试，即使最终一无所用。

sentences.en: even as he spoke their baggage was being unloaded.
sentences.cn: 就在他说话的时候，他们的行李被卸了下来。

sentences.en: Even carrying the camcorder while hiking in the forest was an effort.
sentences.cn: 在森林中徒步旅行时，即便带的是便携式摄像机也非常费力。

sentences.en: even now, after all these years, it upsets me.
sentences.cn: 过了这么多年，甚至到现在，这件事还使我不安。

sentences.en: even then he never raised his voice to me.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此，他从没对我发过火。

sentences.en: even though he was bigger, he never looked down on me.
sentences.cn: 虽然他块头比我大，但是他从没瞧不起我。

sentences.en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentences.cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentences.en: He became quite successful and even appeared on a television show once.
sentences.cn: 他相当成功，甚至还上了一次电视节目。

sentences.en: He had even locked away all the videos of his previous exploits.
sentences.cn: 他甚至将记录他以前伟绩的录像带通通锁起来了。

sentences.en: He had lovely white, even teeth.
sentences.cn: 他有一副洁白整齐的牙齿。

sentences.en: he is a great President, even if he has many enemies.
sentences.cn: 尽管他树敌众多，他仍不失是一位伟大的总统。

sentences.en: He never even acknowledged my letter.
sentences.cn: 他收到我的信甚至从不会告知一声。

sentences.en: He once told an interviewer that he didn't even like rock music.
sentences.cn: 他曾告诉一位采访者，他甚至都不喜欢摇滚乐。

sentences.en: He went even further in his speech to the conference.
sentences.cn: 他在大会发言中作了更进一步的阐述。

sentences.en: His inspiration to fly came even before he joined the Army.
sentences.cn: 他想开飞机的念头在参军之前就有了。

sentences.en: I even began to exploit him in subtle ways.
sentences.cn: 我甚至开始巧妙地利用他。

sentences.en: I still love you even though I'd like to wring your neck.
sentences.cn: 虽然我想掐死你，但我还是爱你的。

sentences.en: I'll get &B{even with} you for this.
sentences.cn: 这件事我会找你算账的。

sentences.en: It was quite difficult to see, even with the light on.
sentences.cn: 这很难看得见，即使开着灯也没有用。

sentences.en: Most companies have suffered a drop in their profits, even very large companies.
sentences.cn: 大多数公司的利润都出现下滑，甚至连很大的公司也不例外。

sentences.en: My voice surprised me; it was even and emotionless.
sentences.cn: 我的声音听起来心平气和、不露一丝感情，这让我自己颇感惊讶。

sentences.en: not the most exciting of places, but even so I was having a good time.
sentences.cn: 虽不是最令人兴奋的地方，但即便如此，我还是玩得很开心。

sentences.en: Recent events have made his central theme even more apposite.
sentences.cn: 新近发生的事情使得他的中心主题显得更加有的放矢。

sentences.en: She did not even bother to phone us.
sentences.cn: 她甚至连电话都没打给我们。

sentences.en: She even had plastic surgery to change the shape of her nose.
sentences.cn: 为改变鼻子的形状，她甚至接受了整形手术。

sentences.en: She took advantage of him even after they were divorced.
sentences.cn: 甚至在他们离婚后，她还在占他的便宜。

sentences.en: Ted hated parties, even gatherings of people he liked individually.
sentences.cn: 特德讨厌各种派对，即便是他自己喜欢的人的聚会也不例外。

sentences.en: The drama takes an idealistic, even a naive view of the subject.
sentences.cn: 这部戏在对待这一主题上有些理想化，甚至是天真。

sentences.en: the fact is suckers never get an even break.
sentences.cn: 事实是涉世未深的人从来得不到公平的机会。

sentences.en: The floor must be completely even before we lay the tiles.
sentences.cn: 地面必须完全平整后才能铺地砖。

sentences.en: The room is kept at an even temperature.
sentences.cn: 这个房间保持恒温状态。

sentences.en: This type of surgery could even be used to extract cancerous growths.
sentences.cn: 这种外科手术甚至可以用来切除癌性肿瘤。

sentences.en: This will make our job even more difficult.
sentences.cn: 这会使我们的工作难上加难。

sentences.en: very likely you are even now picking up the telephone to ring.
sentences.cn: 很可能此刻你正拿起电话打电话。

sentences.en: Wood burns at a fairly even rate.
sentences.cn: 木头以匀速燃烧。

sentences.en: You need a flat, even surface to work on.
sentences.cn: 你需要在一个平整的台面上干活。

words.tran_cn: 在晚上的；为晚上的；晚上用的
均匀地；平衡地；平坦地；平等地
晚上；傍晚；（联欢性的）晚会；后期
变平；变得可比较；成为相等

phrases.tran_cn: 不赚不赔；并列起跑；打成平手
v. 使平坦；使均等；变正常
conj. 即使那样；即使在那时
(非正式)摆平；扯平；进行报复；算账
使平坦；使最后一行排足
坚定地：处于平稳的或不动摇的状态

trans.tran_cn: 平坦的，平均的，双数的，匀称的，平和的
trans.tran_en: not changing very much in amount, speed, etc.
used to emphasize something that is unexpected or surprising in what you are saying
